column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Amazing place to socialize with friends/family all while eating great food! Been here multiple times and every time I bring someone for the first time they instantly fall in love. Highly recommend the sangria
column2: it's not too sweet or too bitter. Literally perfect drink
column3: especially with the paella. Haven't tried out the Bloody Mary bar but heard nothing but great things. Vegetarian options are very limited but delicious nonetheless!
